questions.question: Do a majority of women expect to spend more or less than $50 on a first date?
questions.answerText: 93% of women said they expect to spend less than $50 on a first date
questions.option1: Spend less than $50 on the first date
questions.option2: Spend more than $50 on the first date

questions.question: Do a majority of women prefer to be picked up for their date verses meet their date at a location?
questions.answerText: 85% of women would rather meet their date at the location for the date
questions.option1: Yes a majority of women prefer to be picked up for their date
questions.option2: no a majority of women prefer not to be picked up for their date verses meet their date at a location

questions.question: Would a majority of women give their date more than one date if they do not click?
questions.answerText: Kinda .... 44% of women will only give one date if they did not click with the person
questions.option1: Yes I believe most women would go on another date with that person
questions.option2: no I believe most women would not go on another date with that person

questions.question: On a date if the couple cannot decided on a restaurant to eat at, would a majority of women make the final decision or prefer their date to make the final decision?
questions.answerText: 56% of women would make the final decision
questions.option1: Yes a majority of women would prefer to make the final decision
questions.option2: No a majority of women would like their date to make the final decision

questions.question: Do a vast majority of women like to tell their friends about a date they are going on?
questions.answerText: 85% of women would said they tell their friends about upcoming dates. This is different than 50% of men, who would tell their friends about a date.
questions.option1: Yes a vast majority of women tell their friends when they are going on a date
questions.option2: No a vast majority of women do not tell their friends when they are going on a date

questions.question: If the parents of a woman disapprove of the person they are dating, do you believe that woman will most likely stop dating that person?
questions.answerText: 59% of women would continue to see that person. 81% of men would continue to date a person even if their parents disapprove
questions.option1: I believe a majority of women would not continue to date that person
questions.option2: I believe a majority of women would continue to date that person

questions.question: On a first date, would women rather know if there is a SECOND date or would women rather know about past relationships?
questions.answerText: 59% of women would rather know if there is a SECOND date, but that leaves a close 45% that would want to know about past relationships
questions.option1: A majority of women would rather know if there is a SECOND date
questions.option2: A majority of women would rather know about past relationships

questions.question: Do women believe that check at the end of a date should be split between the two people?
questions.answerText: 52% of women believe the check should be split
questions.option1: Yes women believe the check should be split evenly
questions.option2: No women believe their date should pay for the date

questions.question: If the friends of a woman disapprove of their date, would they continue to see that person?
questions.answerText: 81% of women would continue to see a person their friends disapprove of
questions.option1: They would NOT continue to see that person regardless of the opinions of their friends
questions.option2: They would continue to see that person regardless of the opinions of their friends

questions.question: Do a majority of women consider themselves funny?
questions.answerText: 75% of women consider themselves funny
questions.option1: Yes a majority of women consider themselves funny
questions.option2: No a majority of women do not consider themselves funny

questions.question: Do a vast majority of women play hard to get?
questions.answerText: Only 50% of women play hard to get
questions.option1: Yes a vast majority play hard to get
questions.option2: No a vast majority do not play hard to get

questions.question: Do you believe the average woman likes to become physical on the first date?
questions.answerText: 19% of women like to become physical on the first date
questions.option1: Yes. Physical on the first date
questions.option2: No. Does not become physical

questions.question: Does a vast majority of women believe they are above average in the bedroom?
questions.answerText: Only 50% of women believe they are above average in the bedroom
questions.option1: Yes above average in the bedroom
questions.option2: No not above average in the bedroom

questions.question: Does a majority of women consider themselves flirty?
questions.answerText: 56% of women consider themselves flirty
questions.option2: No they do not consider themselves flirty

questions.question: Have a majority of women ever made an excuse to leave a date early?
questions.answerText: 56% of women said they have made an excuse to leave a date early
questions.option1: No never made an excuse to leave a date early
questions.option2: Yes made an excuse to leave a date early

questions.question: When women were asked 'Have they ever dated somebody already in a relationship?', what do believe were their responses?
questions.answerText: 81% said they have never dated somebody in a relationship. 75% of men said the opposite
questions.option1: Yes dated a person who was already in a relationship
questions.option2: No never dated a person who was already in a relationship

questions.question: If a date lied about their sexual history and was a virgin, what would the vast majority be offended??
questions.answerText: A vast majority would not be offended
questions.option2: No. Not offended

questions.question: If a date lied about their sexual history and had many past sexual encounters, what would be the average response?
questions.answerText: 69% would be offended
questions.option2: Not offended

questions.question: Have a majority of women lied on a date?
questions.answerText: 56% of women have not lied on a date
questions.option2: no

questions.question: When women were asked if they thought their date has to dress 'fashionably', what do you believe their response was?
questions.answerText: 50% of women responded that dressing 'fashionably' was not important
questions.option1: A vast majority of women believe their date needs to dress 'fashionable'
questions.option2: Only some women believe it is important for their date to dress 'fashionably'

questions.question: Would a vast majority of women date somebody 5 years older than themselves?
questions.answerText: Close to 100% of women expressed they would date somebody 5 years older than themselves
questions.option2: No. Would not date somebody 5 years older

questions.question: Would a vast majority of women date somebody 5 years younger than themselves
questions.answerText: 58% of women said they would not date somebody younger than them
questions.option1: Yes. Date somebody 5 years younger themselves
questions.option2: No. Would not date somebody 5 years younger themselves

questions.question: If a date lied about their age and was actually 3 years younger? Would the average woman be offended?
questions.answerText: 83% said they would not continue to see that person
questions.option1: No. An average woman would not be offended
questions.option2: Yes. An average woman would have been offended

questions.question: If a date lied about their age and was actually 3 years older? Would the average woman be offended?
questions.answerText: 67% said they would not continue to see them.
questions.option1: Yes. An average woman would be offended
questions.option2: no. An average woman would have been offended

questions.question: If a woman found out their date was poor. Do you believe the average woman would want to go another date with that person?
questions.answerText: 83% of woman said they would go another date with that person
questions.option1: Yes. The average woman would go another date
questions.option2: No. The average woman would not go another date

questions.question: If a woman found out their date had no friends. Do you believe the average woman would want to go another date with that person?
questions.answerText: 58% of women said they would not go another date with that person
questions.option1: Yes. The average woman would go on another date
questions.option2: No. The average woman would not go on another date

questions.question: Would the average woman wait 30 minutes for a late date?
questions.answerText: 58% said they would wait 30 minutes for a late date
questions.option1: Yes. The average woman would wait 30 minutes
questions.option2: No. The average woman would not wait 30 minutes

questions.question: Would the average woman date somebody shorter than themselves?
questions.answerText: 59% of woman said they would NOT date somebody shorter than themselves?
questions.option2: No. Would not date somebody shorter themselves

questions.question: If the friends of a woman expressed their date was not attractive, would the average woman continue to go the date?
questions.answerText: 75% of woman would continue to go on the date
questions.option1: Yes. Continue to go on the date
questions.option2: No. Not continue to go on the date

questions.question: Would a majority of women go dancing on the first date?
questions.answerText: 57% Would go dancing on the first date
questions.option1: Yes. Go dancing on the first date
questions.option2: No. Would not go dancing on the first date

questions.question: Would the average woman eat dinner with their date's family, as a first date?
questions.answerText: 86% of women said they would NOT eat dinner with the family as a first date
questions.option1: Yes. First date with the date's family
questions.option2: No. No first date with the date's family

questions.question: If a woman found a date boring, do believe the average woman would go on anotehr date with that person?
questions.answerText: 57% of women would go another date
questions.option2: No. Would not go another date

questions.question: If a date did not graduate high school, would the average woman consider it a negative or not care?
questions.answerText: 71% of woman would consider it a negative
questions.option2: It is not a negative

questions.question: Would the average woman date a friend's ex?
questions.answerText: Would not date a friend's ex
questions.option2: No. Would not date a friend's ex

questions.question: If a woman embarrassed herself on a date and you laughed at them, would the average woman be offended?
questions.answerText: 57% of woman said they would be offended
questions.option2: No. Would not be offended

questions.question: Do women prefer to date a person with muscular or non-muscular build?
questions.answerText: 57% prefer a date without a muscular build
questions.option2: No muscular build

questions.question: Does the average woman get nervous before a date?
questions.answerText: 86% of women get nervous before a date
questions.option1: Yes. Get nervous before a date
questions.option2: No. Don't get nervous before a date

questions.question: If date smelled bad, would the average woman let their date know?
questions.answerText: 86% would not tell their date they smell bad
questions.option2: No. Would not tell their date

questions.question: Have a majority of women lied to cancel a date?
questions.answerText: 57% of women have lied to cancel a date
questions.option1: Yes. Lied to cancel a date
questions.option2: No. Never lied to cancel a date

questions.question: Do you believe an average woman needs more than 1 dates to know if they like a person or just 1 date?
questions.answerText: 58% of woman need more than 1 date but that means 42% of woman decide on the first date
questions.option2: No. Just 1 date

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'Attraction' vs 'Intelligence'
questions.answerText: 67% of women said intelligence is more important
questions.option2: Intelligence

questions.question: Would most women date somebody who smokes cigarettes?
questions.answerText: 67% of women would not date somebody who smokes cigarettes
questions.option1: Yes to somebody who smokes cigarettes
questions.option2: No to somebody who smokes cigarettes

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'Gets along with your family ' vs 'Gets along with your friends'
questions.answerText: 66% of women said getting along with her family is more important
questions.option2: Gets along with her friends

questions.question: Do most women consider themselves an above average dater?
questions.answerText: 69% of women belive they are above average daters
questions.option2: No. Not above average

questions.question: Do most women consider themselves more attractive than the average woman?
questions.answerText: 58% of women consider themselves more attractive than the average woman.
questions.option2: No. Less attractive

questions.question: Who many people does the average woman date at one time?
questions.answerText: 83% said just one person at a time
questions.option2: Just one person at a time

questions.question: When woman were asked if their last date was arranged online or not online, what do you believe was their response?
questions.answerText: 59% percent said their last date was met online
questions.option1: Most said they met their last date online
questions.option2: Most said they met their last date not online

questions.question: Would the average woman be comfortable dating somebody who made 4X the income of herself?
questions.answerText: 92%! of women said they would be comfortable dating someobody who made 4X their income
questions.option2: No. Uncomfortable

questions.question: Do you believe the average woman would be comfortable taking $100 to go on a date with somebody that repulsed them?
questions.answerText: 75% said they would be uncomfortable
questions.option2: No. Uncomfortable

questions.question: Would a vast majority of women prefer a mate with a 'Sense of humor' vs 'Good hygiene'?
questions.answerText: 50% of women prefer 'Good hygiene' over 'Sense of humor'
questions.option1: Yes. Prefer a 'Sense of humor' over 'Good hygiene'
questions.option2: No. Not prefer a 'Sense of humor'

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'Their mate's religion' vs 'Their mate's education level'
questions.answerText: 75% believe education level is more important
questions.option2: Education level

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'Being healthy' vs 'Being empathetic'
questions.answerText: 75% belive being empathetic is more important
questions.option2: Being empathetic

questions.question: What is more attractive to a woman: 'Somebody who can stand up for themselves' vs 'Make people around them comfortable'
questions.answerText: 88% find it attractive when their date can make people around them comfortable
questions.option2: Stand up for themselves

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'The woman is sexually attracted to their partner' vs 'Their partner is sexually attracted to the woman'
questions.answerText: 63% of woman prefer somebody attracted to them vs themselves attracted to their partner
questions.option1: The woman is sexually attracted to their partner
questions.option2: Their partner is sexually attracted to the woman

questions.question: Would the average woman date somebody with a past drug problem?
questions.answerText: 69% They would not date somebody with a past problem with drugs
questions.option1: Yes they would date somebody with a past problem with drugs
questions.option2: No they would not date somebody with a past problem with drugs

questions.question: What is more important to women: 'Sexually attractive mate' vs 'A good sense of humor'?
questions.answerText: 75% of women would prefer a 'Sense of humor'
questions.option2: Sense of humor

questions.question: Which is more attractive: 'Their date being a good singer' vs 'Their date being a good dancer'
questions.answerText: 56% prefer to be a good singer
questions.option2: Good dancer is more attractive

questions.question: Which of these two would romantically arouse a woman more: 'Complimented with sweet words' vs 'A physical caress'?
questions.answerText: 56% said a physical caress would be more romantically arousing
questions.option2: A physical caress

questions.question: On average which does a woman prefer her partner to have?
questions.answerText: 77% of women said they prefer their partner to have a job
questions.option2: A job

questions.question: Which one of the two options would an average woman find more arousing: 'Finger tickling their palm' vs 'A kiss on the cheeck' ?
questions.answerText: 52% said fingers tickling their palm
questions.option2: A kiss on the cheek

questions.question: Which do women find more romantic: 'A sweet text' or 'A sweet whisper'?
questions.answerText: 82% said a sweet whisper
questions.option2: A sweet whisper

questions.question: Which do more women find more important: 'Their dates religious views' or 'Their dates political views'?
questions.answerText: 68% said that religious views are more important
questions.option2: Political views are more important

questions.question: Which do women find more important in a potential partner: 'They smell good' or 'They have good hair'?
questions.answerText: 91% said they prefer if their partner smelled good
questions.option2: They smell good

questions.question: Which do women find more romantic: 'Someone who is sexually sensitive' or 'Someone who is sexually wild' ?
questions.answerText: 68% said sexually sensitive
questions.option2: Sexually wild

questions.question: Which do women find more important in a potential partner: 'They have attractive clothing style' or 'They have a nice body'?
questions.answerText: 59% said a nice body is more important
questions.option2: Nice body

questions.question: Which do women find more romantic: 'Sensual rub down the chest' or 'Sensual rub on the thigh' ?
questions.answerText: 77% prefer a sensual rub on the thigh
questions.option2: Sensual rub on the thigh
